metadata.description: When photojournalist Paul Patton, Jr. donned a super hero costume, he thought it would be a quick way to make some news -- now the strange and unusual just can't help but be drawn to the freak-magnetism of the fabulous fighting FOX! There's a strange force lurks in the shadows, and it will take Paul's alter-ego to stop it...
metadata.name: The Fox (Dark Circle Comics)
